attachments.title: Rally Slackbot Commands
attachments.text:
• list <project> [? iteration number]
• tasks <story or defect id>
• accept <story or defect id>
• start <task id>
• complete <task id>
• search <project> ? <keyword>
• create task <story or defect id> <task name>
• create alias <alias> <project name>
• remove alias <alias>
• alias
• help

empty.text:
You may see this message if:
• Your query returned no results
• An unexpected error occured

invalidAlias.text:
You may see this message if:
• Your alias matches a project name
• The project for the alias does not exist
• The alias already exists

error.text:
Oops! Something went wrong!
The online APIs are not responding or the instance of this bot may have an invalid API key for third party services.

unknown.text:
Type "help" for more information.
Make sure all IDs are captialized (ex. US345932, DE43241, TA421389) and the command is complete.
